summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6043 for the improvement of West Smith Street from 26th Avenue West to 27th Avenue West; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 82135, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
